item.title: Healthcare Software Company Epic Faces First Antitrust Suit For Alleged Monopoly Activity
item.description: Particle Health has alleged Epic is a “monopolist” in the electronic health data market. But experts say it's a hard case to win.

item.title: 3 Focus Areas For The Buildings Sector To Be Net-Zero Aligned
item.description: The buildings sector is not on track to reach net zero carbon emissions. Here are three areas for the industry to align with net zero.

item.description: Boston Consulting Group's experience in building its chatbot is instructive for others who want a conversational agent of their own.
